table.name: vtiger_mttr
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_mttr` ( `mttrid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `subject` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`mttrid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_mttrcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_mttrcf` ( `mttrid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`mttrid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
